## each() function

Iterable/AsyncIterable を反復処理し、各要素を順番に `f` に適用します(forEach)。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function each<A, B = unknown>(
  f: (a: A) => B,
  iterable: Iterable<A>,
): void;
```

## Example

```ts
each(console.log, [1, 2, 3]); // log 1, 2, 3
```

[Try It](https://codesandbox.io/s/fxts-each-kvz6w)

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/each.ts)
